content:
emerson baseball triumphed over Babson in game two of their threegame series on Saturday marking the Lions first victory over the Beavers in the programs history PERIOD

The win was the bright spot.. PERIOD

With the first game of Senior Day tied in the bottom of the ninth the winning run on third base senior catcher and cocaptain Matt Nachamie stepped up to the plate with one goal in mind Put the ball.. PERIOD
title: Angelo Deer Archives - The Berkeley Beacon
name: Emerson College
